      • setEvents

        public void setEvents(boolean[] hasEvents,
                      long firstDayStartMillis)
        Update event data
        Parameters:
        hasEvents - list of booleans (one per day) that should be true when there is at least one event in that day
        firstDayStartMillis - millis (since epoch) of the start of the first day of the month
